title: [Large-Scale] Capstone Project Curriculum Based on Statistical Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistics and programming concepts (Python/R)
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning based on online platforms, with practical exercises conducted via learners' personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can select appropriate statistical models for a given dataset and explain the analysis procedure with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can complete a capstone project—from data preprocessing to result interpretation—using templates provided via the LMS.
Learners can represent statistical analysis results as visual materials (graphs/charts) and propose improvements based on peer feedback.

resources: Online Lecture Videos and Practical Guides

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
